title: Now generation
creator_credit: Austral Pacific Productions, National Bank of Australia, Andrew J. Helgeson and Eric Fullilove
brief_description: To be involved with banking is to be involved with people. This is the underlying message on modern career opportunities in one of Australia’s major trading banks. All levels of staff activities are shown in metropolitan, rural and overseas branches. A useful career guide for school leavers.
creator_credit_for_label: Austral Pacific Productions, National Bank of Australia, Andrew J. Helgeson and Eric Fullilove
